launcher.startScript: (cd ~/jenkins-utils && git pull git@github.com:sifive/jenkins-utils.git) && \ AGENT_NAME=SLURM.TINY.008 \ JNLP_SECRET=52c4035e1e506b5ed88c91edc85a9a5a6b9bde76cb06dee7e22becc67cf23525 \ JENKINS_AGENT_SLURM_PARTITION=redhat \ JENKINS_AGENT_CPUS_PER_TASK=8 \ JENKINS_URL=https://jenkins.internal.sifive.com/ \ ~/jenkins-utils/tools/jenkins-agent-salloc-tiny.sh
